name: Love Hentai and Puzzles: Cattle and Horses
name_original: Love Hentai and Puzzles: Cattle and Horses
description:
A new hot jigsaw puzzle game to have some fun! Now with 10 beautiful illustrations, with inspiration from all gay movies, stories and the hot men.
When you start the puzzle the men have clothes and when you finish it they lose their clothes and some unexpected thing can happen!
